game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve a powerful artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost temple hidden deep within the jungle, containing a powerful artifact that could bring great prosperity to our village. We need a brave adventurer to explore the temple, navigate its treacherous traps, and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, increased reputation in the village

task.objective: Gather information about the lost temple's location
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather clues about the temple's whereabouts.
Head east from the village and follow the winding path until you reach the jungle entrance.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous jungle terrain
task.description: Be careful of wild beasts and deadly traps as you make your way deeper into the jungle.
Search for the ancient stone structure hidden behind the foliage.

task.objective: Rerieve the artifact and escape the temple
task.description: Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and fight off fierce creatures to reach the artifact. Once obtained, make your way back through the jungle and return to the village.
